程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.recipe

接口 ArtisanCampfireRecipe.Builder

封闭接口:
ArtisanCampfireRecipe
public static interface ArtisanCampfireRecipe.Builder
Builder interface for creating campfire recipes.

All fields must be set!

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanCampfireRecipe.Builder key(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey key)
      Sets the recipe identifier.
      参数:
      key - The namespace key for this recipe (must not be null)
      返回:
      This builder instance

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanCampfireRecipe.Builder cookTime(int cookTime)
